entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
